description: We offer impartial, free self build advice on a range of topics, in the form of our Free Downloads. Below you will find a range of free downloads covering topics such as budgeting for your self build home and tips for saving money, and how to avoid the common design mistakes many self builders make. We also look at the legislation pertinent to building your own home, and how sustainability requirements may have an effect. Whether you're ready to start building your dream right now, or doing research for a potential future project, you'll find something of interest here.
name: Free Downloads
